meanings.definition: Involving three lines or linear elements.
meanings.sent1: The trilinear design of the building's facade created a modern look.
meanings.sent2: The artist used trilinear patterns to decorate the walls of the room.
meanings.sent3: The trilinear arrangement of the furniture puzzled the interior designer.
meanings.sent4: Her trilinear thinking approach helped her solve complex problems efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The trilinear structure of the bridge made it stand out among the other bridges in the city.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to three lines or linear elements.
meanings.sent1: The trilinear equation involved three variables to solve.
meanings.sent2: The trilinear relationship between the three elements was evident in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The trilinear connection between the characters in the story added depth to the plot.
meanings.sent4: His trilinear explanation of the concept made it easier for everyone to understand.
meanings.sent5: The trilinear composition of the painting showcased the artist's attention to detail.
